DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study evaluate efficacy safety two dose combination Telmisartan/S-Amlodipine ( 80/2.5mg 80/5mg ) compare S-Amlodipine monotherapy ( 2.5mg 5mg ) patient Stage 2 hypertension .
DOC.detailed_description: - In patient Stage 2 hypertension determine efficacy safety Telmisartan/S-Amlodipine ( 80/2.5mg 80/5mg ) S-Amlodipine monotherapy ( 2.5mg 5mg ) 8 week . - This study consist placebo run-in period ( 2 weeks_single blind ) treatment period ( 8 weeks_double blind ) .
